mapper.select: select ROWNUM, alias.* from(select * from product order by product_uploaddate desc) alias where rownum <=10
select ROWNUM, alias.* from (select a.*, t.tender_price from auction a, tender t where a.auction_no=t.auction_no order by a.end_date desc, t.tender_price desc) alias where rownum <=10
select ROWNUM, alias.* from (select p.* from product p, order_finish o where p.product_no=o.orderfinish_product_no order by o.ORDERFINISH_PRODUCT_AMOUNT desc) alias where rownum <=10
select * from rt_auction where rt_auction_date >=to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and rt_auction_date < to_char(sysdate+1,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY rt_auction_date asc
